name: Wedding Venues
short_description: Charming venues for your big day. Perfect settings for your dream wedding.
service_details: Choose from a variety of stunning wedding venues to create cherished memories with your loved ones.

reviews.review_description: Flawless venue selection. Everything was perfect.
Exceptional venue choices. Couldn't be happier.

name: Wedding Catering
short_description: Delicious cuisine for your guests. Memorable dining experiences.
service_details: Customizable catering menu to satisfy your guests' palates and create lasting culinary memories.

reviews.review_description: Incredible wedding food. Our guests loved it!
Catering team exceeded expectations. Highly satisfied.

name: Wedding Photography
short_description: Capture memories with style. Beautifully preserved moments.
service_details: Full-day coverage and beautifully edited wedding photos to cherish for a lifetime.

reviews.review_description: Stunning wedding photos. Thank you for the memories.
Captured every emotion of our day. Highly recommended.

name: Floral Arrangements
short_description: Elegant flowers for your wedding. Stunning floral creations.
service_details: Custom floral designs to match your theme and colors, creating a visually breathtaking atmosphere.

reviews.review_description: Highlight of our wedding. Stunning work!
Beyond beautiful floral arrangements. Many compliments.

name: Wedding Makeup
short_description: Flawless makeup for brides. Enhance your natural beauty.
service_details: Professional makeup artists to enhance your beauty on your big day, ensuring you look radiant.

reviews.review_description: Absolutely flawless bridal makeup. Loved it!
Talented makeup artists. They made me look stunning.

name: Wedding Attire
short_description: Elegant attire for your special day. Beautiful wedding fashion.
service_details: Designer wedding attire for brides, grooms, and bridal parties, ensuring you look your best.

reviews.review_description: Found the perfect wedding gown here. It was stunning!
Quality wedding tuxedos for the groomsmen. Excellent service.
